attributes.additional_details:
Having a 10 month waiting scale for Speech and Language Therapy to be reduced!
Hi I'm Claire, I have twin boys, we went for their assessment on Friday, only to be told that there is a 10 month waiting list....this just isn't on! How many other children out there are suffering with there development skills, because of this!
Let's do something about it, do it for the children!
Sign up, and let's do this!
